mapper.select: SELECT id, manager_id AS managerId, name, type, phone, homepage_url as homepageUrl, address_name, region_1depth_name, region_2depth_name, region_3depth_name, road_name, underground_yn, main_building_no, sub_building_no, building_name, zone_no, x, y, FROM VENUES WHERE id = {#id}

SELECT A.id, A.managerId, A.name, A.type, A.phone, A.homepageUrl, A.address_name, A.region_1depth_name, A.region_2depth_name, A.region_3depth_name, A.road_name, A.underground_yn, A.main_building_no, A.sub_building_no, A.building_name, A.zone_no, A.x, A.y, B.id, B.email, B.name AS userName, B.company_name AS companyName, B.business_reg_no AS businessRegNo, B.role FROM (SELECT id, manager_id AS managerId, name, type, phone, homepage_url AS homepageUrl, address_name, region_1depth_name, region_2depth_name, region_3depth_name, road_name, underground_yn, main_building_no, sub_building_no, building_name, zone_no, x, y FROM VENUES) A, SUPPLIER B WHERE A.managerId = B.id
AND A.id = '${id}'
AND A.name LIKE '%${name}%'
AND A.type = '${type}'
AND A.address_name LIKE '%${addressName}%'
